{{Wired embedded system |brand=SiPEED |model=Lichee RV |asin=B0B2P5WLWS |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=17 |est_release_date=11/2021 |type=SoM |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female (Type-C) |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=D1 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63EFR-RDC |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type C) |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |eth_none=true |flags=Micro SD Card slot, SPI |stock_boot=U-Boot;2018.05 |stock_os=Linux;5.4.61;Debian 11; |default_user=sipeed |default_pass=licheepi }} {{TagLine|RISC-V Compute Module}} :[https://wiki.sipeed.com/hardware/en/lichee/RV/RV.html Product page]
"SiPEED x AWOL", and "Lichee RV" are silkscreened on moudle top.
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/24/sipeed-licheerv-a-low-cost-allwinner-d1-linux-risc-v-board/ ''Sipeed LicheeRV â€“ A $16.90 Allwinner D1 Linux RISC-V board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/17-sbc-runs-linux-on-allwinner-d1-risc-v-soc/ ''$17 SBC runs Linux on Allwinner D1 RISC-V SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://liliputing.com/sipeed-licheerv-is-a-17-computer-module-with-a-risc-v-64-bit-processor/ ''Sipeed LicheeRV is a $17 computer module'' on '''LiliPuting'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Sipeed_Lichee_RV ''Sipeed Lichee RV'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] D1 @1.0GHz :Single-core ''XuanTie'' C906 ([https://occ.t-head.cn/vendor/cpu/index?id=3817197695983423488 RISC-V]) *Storage: TF card (max.1TB)/MMC card *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (OTG) *Power Source: USB Type-C or M.2 B key pin connectors
===See also=== *[[Lichee RV Dock]] *[[Lichee RV Dock Pro]] *[[Lichee Pi Zero (Gen 2)]]
